Class BangBangController

java.lang.Object
  BangBangController
All Implemented Interfaces:
UltrasonicController
public class BangBangController
extends java.lang.Object
implements UltrasonicController

Bang-Bang controller implementation Closed-loop controller the the wall follower robot.

Constructor Summary
BangBangController(int bandCenter, int bandwith, int motorHigh, int motorStraight)
          Default constructor Initialises the member variables and starts the motor at a desired speed going forward
 
Method Summary
 void bothMotorsStraight()
          sets both motors to the same speed
 void leftFaster()
          sets left motor to high speed, right to normal
 void printMotorDistances()
          prints to usb console the current speeds of both motors
 void processUSData(int distance)
          Bang-bang implementation Speeds up outside wheel if distance is too great Speeds up inside wheel if distance is too little

Constructor Detail

BangBangController

public BangBangController(int bandCenter,
                          int bandwith,
                          int motorHigh,
                          int motorStraight)
Default constructor Initialises the member variables and starts the motor at a desired speed going forward

Parameters:
bandCenter - desired distance from the wall
bandwith - allowed region around the bandCenter
motorHigh - fastest speed for the motors
motorStraight - normal cruising speed
Method Detail

processUSData

public void processUSData(int distance)
Bang-bang implementation Speeds up outside wheel if distance is too great Speeds up inside wheel if distance is too little

Specified by:
processUSData in interface UltrasonicController
Parameters:
distance - distance away from the wall
